Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about Graphics objects are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The Graphics object is created by obtaining a reference to a graphic object from the <font face="courier new">PaintEventArgs</font> method.
The Graphics object is created by invoking the <font face="courier new">CreateGraphics()</font> method.
The Graphics object is created by using an instance that inherits from the <font face="courier new">Image</font> class.
The <font face="courier new">DrawRectangle(Pen, Point, Point)</font> method is used to draw a rectangle.
The <font face="courier new">DrawEllipse(Pen, Rectangle)</font> method is used to draw an ellipse by specifying its boundaries using the argument, <font face="courier new">Rectangle</font>.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(True), (C)-(True), (D)-(False), and (E)-(True).
